stories.original_headline: Inside the mysterious collapse of dark matter halos
stories.original_summary: Physicists have unveiled a new way to simulate a mysterious form of dark matter that can collide with itself but not with normal matter. This self-interacting dark matter may trigger a dramatic collapse inside dark matter halos, heating and densifying their cores in surprising ways. Until now, this
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Secrets of Collapsing Shadow Mists
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Wizards of the Celestial Spire have divined a new way to understand the mysterious Shadow Mists. These mists, which interact only with themselves, can cause ethereal realms to dramatically collapse. Their findings reveal strange heating within the heart of these realms.

stories.original_headline: Gamers love AI in game dev — they just don’t know it yet, says Razer’s CEO
stories.original_summary: We’re back to start the year off with a very special live interview with Razer CEO Min-Liang Tan, which we taped in front of a terrific audience at Brooklyn Bowl in Las Vegas during CES.  Razer is obviously best known for making mice, keyboards, and gaming PCs in its signature black and bright green
stories.fantasy_headline: Guild Master Proclaims: Adventurers Embrace Mimicry Magic!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Guild Master of the Serpent's Coil declares that adventurers unknowingly adore the new mimicry magic used in crafting quest scrolls. This powerful enchantment, used to create grand adventures, enhances the tales told by bards and storytellers across the lands.

stories.original_headline: This 5-foot lamp is a supersized tribute to the world’s most iconic pen
stories.original_summary: Seletti, an Italian design brand known for everything from furniture to tableware, has debuted an unusual tribute to an icon of design: the Bic Cristal pen. To celebrate its 75th anniversary, Seletti has supersized the pen and replaced its ink cartridge with a long LED-filled tube to illuminate your
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Artisans' Collective has unveiled a magnificent new creation! To honor the Common Quill's seventy-fifth year, they've crafted a colossal, enchanted quill. This grand artifact, nearly five feet tall, now holds a gleaming arcane core that casts a warm light, brightening any chamber.
